participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Melancholic and introspective, often reflecting on past choices and losses.
participant_1.background: I work at a nursing home. I am overweight and unhappy. My wife left me and took my children. I spend most of my time on Facebook when I am not working. I don't believe in God.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and optimistic, always seeking new experiences and staying active.
participant_2.background: I never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. I only eat kosher. I was raised in a single parent household. I am a stunt double as my second job. I read twenty books a year.
